pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package defines @MonadPeelIO@, a subset of @MonadIO@ into which generic control operations such as @catch@ can be lifted from @IO@. Instances are based on monad transformers in @MonadTransPeel@, which includes all standard monad transformers in the @transformers@ library except @ContT@. For convenience, it provides a wrapped version of Control.Exception with types generalized from @IO@ to all monads in @MonadPeelIO@.
